attributes.additional_details: Send an international military force to search for and bring to justice the militia's in the Democratic Republic of Congo. Stop the mass killing, rape and savagery that has been happening for 10 years. There are no words to describe the horrors that happen every day in the Congo. We have the power to stop this evil now!

rejection.details: The UK is not solely responsible for sending international forces.  Suggest you re-word your petition along the lines of, for example, raising with UN colleagues
